name: John Garcia
bio: Students will learn industry-standard software and workflows. Projects include creating realistic 3D models and animations. Emphasis is placed on practical, hands-on experience.

name: Mike Davis
bio: By the end of this course, students will have a professional-quality demo reel. This course covers advanced techniques in visual effects. Emphasis is placed on practical, hands-on experience.
